about_the_game:
A stylish turn-based RPG in the grimdark world of Darkness and White Noise, where you will have to fight the God-Deamon Horn himself! The game is unique in its original mechanics: fast hybrid turn-based battles against hundreds of opponents, a rampage system, a combo system and a unique character progression system!

The game takes place in the original world of Darkness and White Noise. The God-Deamon Horn, the Destroyer of Worlds, arrives at the planet where he was once born as a man, to remember his past, mortal life. He hears the desperate prayers of the local fanatical Priestess, and seduces her soul, making her his assistant. Neither armies nor kingdoms could repel the space invader. But three of the strongest heroes want to make a last desperate attempt to strike at his army. They follow in the footsteps of the Priestess.

You will play as a group of three heroes and fight hordes of monsters in a dynamic hybrid turn-based combat system, where heroes move in turn-based mode, and monsters move simultaneously, which allows you to overcome hordes of monsters in fast-paced, dynamic and spectacular battles!

Hybrid turn-based combat system. On enemy turn, they do their turns simultaneously.

On player turn, earch of 3 character do there turns one after another.

Combo system and Rampage systems. Combo system lets you use combinations of your base skills as one super skill! Rampage system gives bonuses for multiple kills such as HP heal, friend revive and one more turn!

Defeat the legions of darkness and kill their ruler, the God-Demon Horn!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD FX-6300, Intel 2500k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050ti, AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500x, Intel i7 8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1650 super, AMD Radeon RX 590
